attributes.action: not let any level of government impose new or higher taxes without a new vote of support from those they tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The purpose for which parliament was established was to ensure the Monarch could not raise new taxes without approval. 
The cabinet, and other levels of government such as councils, have now taken the tax raising powers formally held by the Monarch.
They should then have to obtain a new mandate from their electorate each time they want to  obtain additional or higher taxes.
